DarkMouse::

She heard Quickstrike call out and turned to see what was going on. 
She saw the big red flyer standing near Quickstrike. She dropped her 
crates and ran back to Quickstrike. She drew her small pistol out 
and  ran to Quickstrike's side. She drew her gun on the flier. "Don't 
move unless you want your..." she stopped and lowered her gun as soon 
as she saw it was Terrorsaur standing there. "Hey! Your alive! WOW! I 
thought you got slagged or something. Gosh! It's great to see you 
again. Wow, half the old gang is back together again. This is great!"
She put her gun away and kept smiling up at Terrorsaur and 
Quickstrike. "So what are you doing here? Just flying around and 
happen to run into us huh?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> Taking watch was just as bad as lugging around supplies. Maybe even 
> worse. He looked around, arching his neck left and right, taking at 
> glance at the others.
> 
> After of few more mintures of leaning against the side of the ramp 
> wall, he saw something in the sky. It looked like a flier. He 
snapped 
> up and watched it. His optics were the keenest part of his senses.
> 
> It got closer.
> 
> "Hey!" he called to alert the others. He trotted down to the end of 
> the ramp and stood in attention to the approaching flier. It has 
> wings, red in color.
> 
> He aimed his arm up at it, ready to fire, then he realized what it 
> was.
> 
> "Dang." He lowered his arm. It was Terrorsaur. He dactyl landed by 
> him. "Where in tarnation were you?"
> 
> "Spying," the dactyl replied. His wings shook a little.
> 
> "Spying, huh?" He turned his head towards the others.
